One of the main reasons that the uncanny valley is so unsettling is that it violates our expectations. We expect objects and animals to behave in certain ways based on their appearance, and when they don't, it can be disconcerting. For example, if we see a humanoid robot that looks almost human, we might expect it to move and behave in a way that is similar to how a human would move and behave.
